column2: January 6]], [[1966]] as '''A.S. Dileep Kumar''') is an Indian composer and musical producer. For his music for ''[[wikipedia:slumdog Millionaire
column3: Slumdog Millionaire]]'', he won two Academy Awards. He composed the music for ''[[The Lord of the Rings Musical]]'', along with [[Värttinä]] and [[Christopher Nightingale]].
